title: Cashew and Chicken Stir-fry
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '500g skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into strips', '50g cashew nuts', '1 large yellow pepper, sliced', '4 celery sticks, thinly sliced', '4 spring onions, sliced', '2 courgettes, halved lengthways and thinly sliced', '50g ready-to-eat dried apricots, sliced', '4 tbsp dry sherry', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', '1/2 Chinese cabbage, finely shredded', '25g fresh basil leaves']
